addressbook

Class InputOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • addressbook.InputOutput

  • public class InputOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    The InputOutput class handles all operations of the address book application

      • mainMenuMessage

        public static java.lang.String mainMenuMessage(java.lang.String bookSelected)
        The mainMenuMessage() method produces a String output for the main message to appear on the user's screen
        Parameters:
        bookSelected - the file name of the current address book (selected by user)
        Returns:
        a customized string for the user reflecting the current address book

                                                                              Person sample)
        Creates a sample address book with one sample object
        Parameters:
        addressBook - a TreeMap with key being name and values being Person objects
        sample - a person object for illustration
        Returns:
        an address book as a TreeMap

                                                                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Retrieves an address book in TreeMap form given the file name
        Parameters:
        addressBookSelected - the file name in string form
        Returns:
        an address book as a Java TreeMap
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Returns:

        An interactive interface for deleting a contact from an address book
        Parameters:
        addressBook - an address book in Java TreeMap format
        Returns:
        the revised address book in Java TreeMap format

      • editContact

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the revised Java TreeMap address book

      • getAddressObjects

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Person> getAddressObjects(java.lang.String addressBookSelected)
                                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Retrieves address books as Java TreeMap form given the name of the file containing the Person objects
        Parameters:
        addressBookSelected - the address book file name in string form
        Returns:
        an address book in Java TreeMap form
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • writeAddressObjects

        public static void writeAddressObjects(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Person> addressObjects,
                                       java.lang.String addressBookSelected)
        Used to write the address book to a file every time the application is shut down
        Parameters:
        addressObjects - an address book as a Java TreeMap
        addressBookSelected - the file name for saving the address book

      • getAddressTextData

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Person> getAddressTextData()
        The getAddressTextData() method was used to originally populate an address book. It was not used in the application after the original import, but could be used in future versions to import text in csv file format into the application
        Returns:
        the address book as a Java TreeMap
